short_summary: Dell Alienware PC`s or Equivalent for RCMP
full_summary:
================

**Solicitation Notice**

**Description of Requirement**

Shared Services Canada is seeking a supplier to provide Dell Alienware PC’s or equivalent to the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). The requirements are as follows:

* 8 Dell Alienware Aurora R13 systems or equivalents
* 8 Dell Alienware X15 systems or equivalents

The equipment is required to support investigators with digital forensic investigations.

**Delivery Details**

* Delivery destination: Westmount, Quebec
* Delivery date: On or before March 31st, 2023

**Security Requirements**

* None

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA)**

* None

**Tender Documents**

The solicitation package and bid submission instructions can be accessed through the Government of Canada's online procurement system at the following link:

https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

**Inquiries and Submissions**

All inquiries and submissions must be addressed in writing to:

Sorn Prak
Procurement Officer
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor
PO Box/CP 9808 STS T CSC
Ottawa, Ontario K2G 2N1
Email: [sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Telephone: (613) 298-2073

**Language of Bid**

Bids may be submitted in either English or French.

**Amendment 001**

Please note that this solicitation has been amended to reflect updated requirements. The amendment number is SSC-23-00021367:T Amendment 1.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

This solicitation notice has been issued in accordance with the Government of Canada's procurement policies and procedures.

**Procurement Method**

This procurement will be conducted in accordance with the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat’s procurement policies and procedures.

**Trade Agreements**

The contract will be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity**

This procurement is open to suppliers from Canada.

**Regions of Delivery**

Delivery of the equipment is restricted to Quebec, except for the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contracting Entity Name**

Shared Services Canada is the contracting entity for this procurement. RECOMMENDED FORMATION RECOMMENDATION  
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award. 
\\
